subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With a game modeled on Tim Duncan’s, Talib Zanna scored 18 points on 6 of 7 shooting and made all six of his free throws to lead Pittsburgh over Colorado in a South Region game.
snippet: With a game modeled on Tim Duncan’s, Talib Zanna scored 18 points on 6 of 7 shooting and made all six of his free throws to lead Pittsburgh over Colorado in a South Region game.
